attributes.action: Give the winter fuel allowance to people who left the UK before the qualifying dates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although I will get my full state pension when I am 65, because I left the UK for Spain before the qualifying date I am not entitled to receive the winter fuel allowance.  This appears to be morally wrong especially because it seems that even if I return to the UK I still cannot get the allowance.  Also when I notified the DSS that I was leaving, I was not warned of this.
